<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ring of Observation](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2465)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 87 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

**Access** Second-mark members of the Firebrands have access to this item.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This simple gold ring is engraved with eyes and is inlaid with a single amber-colored cat-eye gemstone. While the gemstone itself isn't magical, it gives off the eerie impression that it's watching you. A Firebrand makes use of this ring to determine if they've drawn the attention of locals and guards without the owner giving away the fact that they know others are watching. More powerful versions of the ring help Firebrands escape the sight of others when necessary.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> envision;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** The watchful eye of the cat-eye gemstone remains unmoving but feels as if it's surveying your surroundings. The eye continues this uncanny surveying for 1 minute. During this time, you can use a single action, which has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait, to focus on the ring. When you focus on the ring, it grows warm to the touch if you're being intentionally observed by creatures within 30 feet. The ring can only notice creatures that aren't [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) from you and that are intentionally watching you. The ring ignores people who are part of a crowd but aren't actively paying attention to you, for example.

</column>

level="2"

pfs="Standard"
>
Ring of Observation (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 87 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 300 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The ring surveys for 10 minutes and notices creatures out to 60 feet. The ring can cast [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) on you once per day.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Standard"
>
Ring of Observation (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 87 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 1,160 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The ring surveys for 1 hour and notices creatures out to 120 feet. The ring can cast either _invisibility_ or 4th-level _invisibility_ on you once per day.
